trans-unit.source: Represents a rule that checks for errors that are raised by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo" /> implementation of the source object.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma regra que verifica se há erros gerados pela implementação <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo" /> do objeto de origem.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] modelo de associação de dados permite que você associe <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> com um <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If your source object implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> interface, you can use the built-in rule <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> to check for errors raised by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto de origem implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> interface, você pode usar a regra interna <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> para verificar se há erros gerados pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementação.

trans-unit.source: An alternative syntax to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> explicitly is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> property to `true` on your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma sintaxe alternativa à configuração o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> explicitamente é definir o <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> propriedade `true` em seu <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar uma regra personalizada, criando uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.

trans-unit.source: For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações e uma discussão detalhada da validação de dados, consulte [visão geral de associação de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule.%23ctor%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: A cultura a ser usada nesta regra.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: Executa as verificações de validação em um valor.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule.Validate%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
